start.question: What are you having trouble with?

exchange_poloniex_delist.answer: Poleniex delisted DigiByte.  There is no way to recover your coins now.  Your only chance and it is a small one is to contact a lawyer
exchange_poloniex_delist.question: Do you still need help?

options.format_receive: Invalid address when I try to withdraw DGB
options.format_send: Invalid address when I try to deposit DGB

exchange_cant_help.answer: You will need to contact the exchange for assistance.
exchange_cant_help.question: Do you still need help?

format_receive.answer: The person/company trying to send you funds is using outdated code.  Try providing them a legacy address(one that starts with D).  If your wallet does not have this option download Coinomi and use it.
format_receive.question: Do you still need help?

format_send.answer: The wallet you are using is outdated.  Recommend installing Coinomi as it supports all modern address formats.
format_send.question: Do you still need help?

dead_go.answer: DigiByte Go is dead. Recommend you download Coinomi or another wallet and use DigiSweep.digiassetX.com to recover your funds
dead_go.question: Do you still need help?

wallet_not_go.question: Are you having difficulty sending funds?

wallet_probable_miner.question: Have you mined to the wallet or received a lot of times without sending?

wallet_miner.answer: Your wallet is probably no longer functional because there are to many UTXOs. DigiSweep.digiassetX.com can be used to move all your funds to a new address and fix this problem.
wallet_miner.question: Did this fix your problem?

options.wallet_asset_cant_send: Can't send a DigiAsset to someone

wallet_asset_cant_send.question: Do you have any DigiByte in the Wallet?

wallet_asset_no_funds.answer: You must have at least 0.001 DGB in your wallet to send DigiAssets
wallet_asset_no_funds.question: Do you still have a problem?

wallet_asset_cant_send2.question: Does the address you are trying to send to start with dgb1?

wallet_asset_ask_legacy.answer: Ask the person you are trying to send to, to get a legacy address.  It will show under qr code on there phone.
wallet_asset_ask_legacy.question: Do you still need help?

wallet_mobile_sync.answer:
This is likely a DNS issue caused by a lot of budget / freely provided home routers. You want to do the following steps:

Turn off your WiFi on your phone
Power off your device
Power it back on while connected to JUST mobile-data such as a 3G / 4G data connection
Fire up the DigiByte mobile app and wait for the syncing to begin
Once syncing has begun, you can re-join your WiFi
You must do these steps in this order so that when your phone powers on, it asks your mobile-carrier for DNS. Often times home routers will keep providing stale DNS entries to devices such as Cellphones on WiFi, meaning even if you reboot your phone while on WiFi you still won't have much luck.

It should begin to sync within a couple of seconds once you have re-opened the app again.

Should you still have issues even following this troubleshooting steps above, you can also go to Menu -> Settings -> Sync blockchain, and it will perform a full re-sync. This will not affect your funds, but will take approx 20-30 minutes.
wallet_mobile_sync.question: Do you still need help?

options.wallet_core_less_then_have: Says I don't have enough funds but I do
options.wallet_core_restore: How do i restore a core wallet?

wallet_core_less_then_have.answer: This occasionally happens for people that have really old wallets. Download Coinomi or another wallet on your phone then in the debug console run walletpassphrase yourpassword 60 to unlock your wallet then dumpwallet filename to save your private keys to a file. Open the file in a text editor and use either Coinomi's sweep function or https://DigiSweep.digiassetX.com to sweep your funds to the new wallet.
wallet_core_less_then_have.question: Do you still need help?

wallet_core_miner.answer: You likely have to many UTXOs in your wallet. You can fix this by sending a smaller amount to yourself a few times or if you have been mining you may want to go to the console and type dumpprivkey miningaddress. Then use DigiSweep.digiassetX.com to send the funds from the provided private key back to your wallet.
wallet_core_miner.question: Do you still need help?

wallet_core_restore.question: What operating system are you running?

core_restore_windows.answer: Open a file explorer and in the address bar type %appData%\DigiByte then copy your wallet.dat file to this folder.(If you named it something else rename it to wallet.dat)
core_restore_windows.question: Do you need help installing the newest wallet?

core_restore_mac.answer: Goto ~/Library/Application Support/DigiByte/ then copy your wallet.dat file to this folder.(If you named it something else rename it to wallet.dat)
core_restore_mac.question: Do you need help installing the newest wallet?

core_restore_linux.answer: goto ~/.digibyte/ then copy your wallet.dat file to this folder.(If you named it something else rename it to wallet.dat)
core_restore_linux.question: Do you need help installing the newest wallet?

wallet_core_old.answer: Shut down your core wallet.  Once shut down continue bellow
wallet_core_old.question: What operating system are you using?

delete_blocks_windows.answer: Open a file explorer and in the address bar type %appData%\DigiByte then delete the blocks and indexes folders if they exist. Install the newest wallet and start it up if you haven't already.
delete_blocks_windows.question: Do you need help installing the newest wallet?

delete_blocks_mac.answer: Goto ~/Library/Application Support/DigiByte/ then delete the blocks and indexes folders if they exist. Install the newest wallet and start it up if you haven't already.
delete_blocks_mac.question: Do you need help installing the newest wallet?

delete_blocks_linux.answer: goto ~/.digibyte/ then delete the blocks and indexes folders if they exist. Install the newest wallet and start it up if you haven't already.
delete_blocks_linux.question: Do you need help installing the newest wallet?

done_no_help.answer:
Sorry this could not help you.
Warning before continuing be warned that scammers are everywhere. Nevere accept support in a private message even if they look like an admin. Many eyes keep everyone honest. Please go to DGBSupport on telegram and ask your question.
